InputController
BaseInput
public abstract
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputControllers.​InputController
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​InputControllers.​UnityUIInputController

A layer over Unity's BaseInput that connects the BaseInput to TouchFree Tooling InputActions as they are provided. Contains setup functions allowing inheritors to define only the input behaviour they wish to see.

Override HandleInputAction to react to InputActions as they are recieved.

For an example InputController, see UnityUIInputController.

MonoBehaviour Overrides
Start
protected override void Start()

Adds a listener to InputActionManager to invoke HandleInputAction with InputActions as they are received.

OnDestroy
protected override void OnDestroy()

Deregisters HandleInputAction from the InputActionManager so this can go out of scope.

HandleInputAction
protected virtual void HandleInputAction(
InputAction _inputData
)

This method is the core of the functionality of this class. It will be invoked with the InputAction as they are provided to the Tooling from the TouchFree Service.

Override this function to implement any custom input handling functionality you wish to see.

Parameters
_inputData
InputAction

The latest input action recieved from TouchFree Service.
